author: lowette
body:
Backport of pull request #44992
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/44992
for the integration of the sexaquark simulation code to CMSSW_10_2_X.

Backport needed to run sexaquark simulation under 2018 UL B-parking conditions to validate private simulation from the 10_2 cycle. Such validation was requested by EXO MC&I conveners @tvami @dickychant

+CC @vetens
title: Backport of pull request #44992 for the integration of the sexaquark
